pages.text: $(li)Rarely does a Goblin more intelligent than the rest who manages to bend the rest and become the $(l:patchouli:bosses/goblin_king)Goblin King$(/l) appears.$(br)$(li)This one orders to build a fortress where other goblins serve and safeguard them and their treasures from outsiders.$(br)$(li)This structure can be found over the Overworld.
$(li)Be prepared, all their minions and their faithful and most powerful servant, the $(l:patchouli:bosses/ogre)Ogre$(/l) will be waiting for you.
